H0.text: American businessman and philanthropist Solomon Guggenheim (1861-1949) established a famous eponymous international network of. Library

H3.text: American businessman and philanthropist Solomon Guggenheim (1861-1949) established a famous eponymous international network of. Musem

A4.text: The Guggenheim Museums are a group of museums in different parts of the world established (or proposed to be established) by the Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation.
